title: Garen's ult reveals the true shaco
body:
idk if this works on other champions with clones, Leblanc and Wukong, 
but I was just Garen on an ARAM. enemy Shaco becomes the villain and when he ults, the marker is still hovering the real shaco like a red buff would.

The clone should be an actual clone at the time of casting, i.e., if shaco was the villain before he ulted, the real shaco and his clone should both have the villain marker. 

I'd argue  that this should be the case for buffs too, e.g. give Leblanc's mirror image a blue buff if she had a blue buff when her passive pops...but let's not get ahead of ourselves.

**tl;dr** put villain marker on shaco AND his clone. the same goes for wukong, leblanc, and any other duplicating champs i may have forgotten.

replies.body: Anyone have a video of this happening in the last patch or two? I put a good amount of time into some special casing that I think fixed the Villainy marker against clones in a recent patch, so if it's still happening, I'd like to be able to see it so I can identify what part of that may not be working.

The problem isn't that Villainy works on clones. Its the fact that if Shaco, for example, is the villain then when he uses his ult he will still be marked while the clone will not be. It's a free way of determining the clone from across the map without having to use any spell or summoner to mark the real Shaco
I get that. I specifically special-cased the Villain debuff so that the clone inherits the visuals from Villainy, so if it's not working, I'd like to try and figure out why.
I actually think it marking the true one makes sense. Villains will not escape JUSTICE!
What have you done?  You're supposed to say that Shaco is the most underpowered champion in the game and that he needs a million buffs to be viable again!
I never want to go back to the dark days of Shaco being viable or powerful.

Shaco main here. I'm being perfectly unbiased when I say shaco is already very vulnerable to AOE damage. garen is the type of champion that's already super effective vs him. there really is no need to handicap shaco further with this 'bug'

There's also another issue with Garen's passive: The icon. When Quinn ults her icon changes to Valor, so every time she's the villain Garen can see when she ults, which is problematic since we like using it to roam. Same issue applies to Gnar to a lesser extent.

Someone else brought up Kindred when I brought up this issue as well, that Kindred may have the same issue. :c

(Please don't remove the icon changing I like it :c)

you know how else you can tell a shaco from his clone?  jungle buffs.  ignite.  the fact that the clone dies much faster.  a pink ward.  common sense by seeing which shaco goes where.

The clone shares all current stats with Shaco when the clone is made, so it can't die faster than the normal Shaco

Pink wards do not reveal which one is the clone (though it will reveal Shaco if he Qs immediately after cloning).

Common sense isn't as helpful, since good Shaco players can really make it confusing by switching up where the real one goes (like sending the real one to the middle lane and the fake one to the turret).
